price: Eka nateshwe ate, si nk'uko avyibwira. Twebwe Allah, Tuzokwandika ivyo avuga mu kurementaniriza Imana Allah, Duheze Tumwongerereze ibihano vy’ubwoko bwose mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa;
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
